parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular

str2: An accuser, prosecutor. From kata and agora; against one in the assembly, i.e. A complainant at law; specially, Satan.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
From the same as aiteo; a cause, i.e. reason, crime.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To conjecture, suppose, suspect, deem. From hupo and noieo; to think under, i.e. To surmise or conjecture.
